lead_paragraph: Stocks closed more than 1 percent lower as disappointing results from a number of bellwether companies pointed to weakening conditions, while an unexpected decline in durable goods orders also weighed on sentiment.
snippet: Stocks closed more than 1 percent lower as disappointing results from a number of bellwether companies pointed to weakening conditions, while an unexpected decline in durable goods orders also weighed on sentiment.

headline.main: Weak Corporate Results Put the Market in a Hole
headline.print_headline: Weak Corporate Results Put the Market in a Hole
